subject: Peter Skerritt - Order SSN1841 Cancellation
description_text:
To whom it may concern, 

I would like to request a cancellation of my order #SSN1841 due to an error in which product I selected. 

I have sent another order through, but request the order #SSN1841 be refunded. 

Many thanks, 

Peter Skerritt

conversations.body_text: Hi Peter Skerritt,  Okay, we've refunded you. It'll be in your account within 2 working days.
